About Liam's Office

Welcome to my personal corner of the internet! I'm Liam, a tech enthusiast and classic sci-fi lover. This site serves as my digital office where I share:

  • Home lab experiments and tech tutorials
  • Reviews and analyses of 60s-70s sci-fi classics
  • Occasional ramblings about technology and cinema

Join me as I explore the intersection of technology and imagination!
